original_text: And Jehoash the son of Jehoahaz took again out of the hand of Benhadad the son of Hazael the cities, which he had taken out of the hand of Jehoahaz his father by war. Three times did Joash beat him, and recovered the cities of Israel.
korean_text: 여호아하스의 아들 요아스가 하사엘의 아들 벤하닷의 손에서 성읍을 다시 빼앗으니 이 성읍들은 자기 부친 여호아하스가 전쟁 중에 빼앗겼던 것이라 요아스가 벤하닷을 세 번 쳐서 무찌르고 이스라엘 성읍들을 회복하였더라

sentences.original_text: And Jehoash the son of Jehoahaz
took again out of the hand of Benhadad
which he had taken out of the hand of Jehoahaz
Three times did Joash beat him,
and recovered the cities of Israel.
